name: Flash Step
description:
This is a little experiment to coincide with the GMTK Game Jam. Needed to get back in the swing with this, but I think it turned out alright.

The theme of the Jam was "Only One." We decided that meant you only got to see your character for 1 frame of play.

Enter all your moves to reach the goal, then press enter to see where you'll actually end up.
